description: Devils thrash Clan in Elite League
title: Devils thrash Clan in Elite League
title_page: Devils thrash Clan in Elite League - BBC Sport
maintext:
Cardiff Devils bounced back after heavy defeat against Manchester Storm by beating Glasgow Clan 6-1 in the Elite League.
Josh MacDonald opened the scoring for Devils, who had lost 6-0 to Storm last Sunday.
Cole Ully levelled for Clan in the second period but goals from Riley Brandt, Tyler Busch and Bradley Schoonbaert put Devils firmly in control,
Cole Sanford and Ryan Barrow sealed the win for Devils, who are away to Dundee Stars on Sunday.
